text: Bora Bora is a small island in the Leeward group of the Society Islands of French Polynesia, an overseas territory of France in the Pacific Ocean. Vaitape is the largest city on the island with 4,000 people. There is an airport on an islet where residents can fly to other islands in French Polynesia. Bora Bora has one main road which runs around the island. == Other websites == * Bora Bora Pictures Bora Bora Photos * Bora Bora entry on WorldAtlas.com * Bora Bora Islands Pictures Pictures of the Islands Category:Islands of French Polynesia
title: Bora Bora
